sentences.english: The monitoring system samples stack gas at a rate proportional to the stack gas volumetric flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 烟道气样品的监控系统速率成正比的烟气体积流量。

sentences.english: Reburning process for flue gas denitrification and its main affecting factors are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 综述了再燃法烟气脱硝技术及其主要影响因素。

sentences.english: Effect of microstructure characteristics of Ga-based sorbents on SO2 removal was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了钙基脱硫剂的微观结构特性对烟气脱硫的影响。

sentences.english: The paper describes the process characteristic of pure seawater flue gas desulphurization(SWFGD)developed by Dongfang Boiler Group Co.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了东方锅炉自主开发的纯海水烟气脱硫工艺特点。

sentences.english: Barbecue smoke took flight from the Kaufmans' backyard.
sentences.chinese: 从考夫曼家的后院里，升腾起烧烤的烟气。

sentences.english: Within a minute, a cloud of tiny droplets forms in the goldfish bowl.
sentences.chinese: 不到一分钟，鱼缸形的容器内就飘出袅袅烟气。

sentences.english: E. S. P Electrical Control equipments, Used to clear industrial fume.

锅炉上烟气挡板不工作。

sentences.english: The process using barium residue in three - phrase fluidized bed reactor was developed to remove sulfur dioxide from flue gas.
sentences.chinese: 提出了在三相流化床内用钡渣进行烟气脱硫的方法。

sentences.english: Selective non catalyst reduction (SNCR) is a mature technology for moderate NOx emission control on flue gas.
sentences.chinese: 对烟气脱硝的选择性非催化还原技术进行了介绍。

sentences.english: Humidification plays a key role in SO_2 removal for semi-dry flue gas desulfurization(FGD). In the article.
sentences.chinese: 烟气增湿对半干半湿法烟气脱硫起着关键作用。

sentences.english: Humidification plays a key role in SO_2 removal for semi-dry flue gas desulfurization(FGD). In the article.
sentences.chinese: 烟气增湿对半干半湿法烟气脱硫起着关键作用。

sentences.english: The debugging of FGD engineering in power plant is a new topic.
sentences.chinese: 电厂烟气脱硫工程的调试是一门新课题。

sentences.english: The problems in the scrubbing water treatment system of converter flue gas of Xiangtan Iron & Steel Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了湘钢转炉烟气除尘水处理系统存在的问题。

sentences.english: It is used to control the pressure of regenerator and regulate the inlet flow of flue gas blower.
sentences.chinese: 它用来控制再生器的压力和调节烟气输送机入口流量。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the feature of technological design of liquid supply system of lime wet FGD.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了石灰湿法烟气脱硫给液系统工艺设计特点。
